SELECT standARD.STANDARD_ID AS standardId ,standARD.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode ,StandARD.BREED_CODE AS breedCode ,StandARD.FEATURE_CODE AS featureCode ,(CASE WHEN StandARD.QLT_FLG='1' THEN '有' ELSE '无' END) AS hasQtySpec ,(CASE WHEN StandARD.TNC_FLG='1' THEN '有' ELSE '无' END) AS hasTncSpec ,Classes.CLASSES_NAME AS classesName ,Breed.BREED_NAME AS breedName ,feature.FEATURE_NAME AS featureName FROM PD_STANDARD AS standARD INNER JOIN PD_CLASSES AS Classes ON StandARD.CLASSES_CODE = Classes.CLASSES_CODE INNER JOIN PD_BREED AS Breed ON StandARD.CLASSES_CODE = Breed.CLASSES_CODE AND StandARD.BREED_CODE = Breed.BREED_CODE INNER JOIN PD_FEATURE AS feature ON StandARD.CLASSES_CODE = feature.CLASSES_CODE AND StandARD.BREED_CODE = feature.BREED_CODE AND StandARD.FEATURE_CODE = feature.FEATURE_CODE WHERE StandARD.QLT_FLG='1' OR StandARD.TNC_FLG='1'
LIMIT #{startPos}, #{pageCount}

SELECT count(1) FROM PD_STANDARD AS StandARD INNER JOIN PD_CLASSES AS Classes ON StandARD.CLASSES_CODE = Classes.CLASSES_CODE INNER JOIN PD_BREED AS Breed ON StandARD.CLASSES_CODE = Breed.CLASSES_CODE AND StandARD.BREED_CODE = Breed.BREED_CODE INNER JOIN PD_FEATURE AS feature ON StandARD.CLASSES_CODE = feature.CLASSES_CODE AND StandARD.BREED_CODE = feature.BREED_CODE AND StandARD.FEATURE_CODE = feature.FEATURE_CODE WHERE StandARD.QLT_FLG='1' OR StandARD.TNC_FLG='1'

SELECT PdStdSubCla.QLT_STD_SUB_ID AS qltStdSubId ,PdStdSubCla.QLT_STD_SUB_NAME AS qltStdSubName ,PdStdSubCla.QLT_STD_CLA_ID AS qltStdClaId FROM PD_QLT_STD_SUB_CLA AS PdStdSubCla WHERE 1=1 AND PdStdSubCla.QLT_STD_CLA_ID = #{filterMap.qltStdClaId}
SELECT PdStdCla.QLT_STD_CLA_ID AS qltStdClaId ,PdStdCla.QLT_STD_CLA_NAME AS qltStdClaName FROM PD_QLT_STD_CLA AS PdStdCla

SELECT A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID AS tncStdItemId ,B.TNC_STD_ITEM_NAME AS tncStdItemName ,A.TNC_STD_VAL1 AS tncStdVal1 ,A.TNC_STD_VAL2 AS tncStdVal2 ,A.TNC_STD_VAL3 AS tncStdVal3 FROM PD_TNC_STD AS A LEFT JOIN PD_TNC_STD_ITEM B ON A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID = B.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID WHERE A.STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId}
